statements: SELECT * FROM identity_theft_alerts WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, activity_timestamp, activity_description FROM identity_theft_alerts WHERE alert_level > 2 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM identity_theft_alerts WHERE alert_level = 1 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_alerts WHERE activity_description LIKE '%hacked%' AND alert_level <= 1;
SELECT MAX(alert_level) AS max_alert_level, COUNT(*) AS total_alerts FROM identity_theft_alerts;
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_alerts WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM identity_theft_alerts WHERE alert_level >= 2;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, MIN(activity_timestamp) AS first_activity_time FROM identity_theft_alerts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_alerts FROM identity_theft_alerts GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_alerts > 5;
SELECT user_id, MAX(alert_level) AS highest_alert_level FROM identity_theft_alerts;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT email, username FROM users WHERE id = '9f7d3a5e-51e2-4d88-88e9-3d16f6d8c113';
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE flagged = TRUE;
SELECT activity_type, description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 'e6b64ff0-487c-420e-b872-c00173cecb72';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john%';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 'f6d41310-8434-4d6d-b30d-1855c600f66e';
SELECT u.username, sa.activity_type, sa.description FROM users u JOIN suspicious_activities sa ON u.id = sa.user_id WHERE sa.alert_sent = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_alerts;
SELECT alert_id, alert_message FROM identity_theft_alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_description FROM suspicious_activities ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_role FROM users WHERE user_role = 'admin';
SELECT user_name, user_email, activity_type, activity_description FROM users JOIN suspicious_activities ON users.user_id = suspicious_activities.user_id WHERE user_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_alerts FROM identity_theft_alerts;
SELECT user_name, user_email, activity_timestamp FROM users LEFT JOIN suspicious_activities ON users.user_id = suspicious_activities.user_id WHERE activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT email, password FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM login_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, action FROM identity_theft_attempts WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM login_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM alerts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp FROM identity_theft_attempts WHERE action = 'Unauthorized Access' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, email, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT flag_reason, flag_date FROM flags WHERE flag_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT flag_reason, flag_date FROM flags WHERE flag_id IN (SELECT flag_id FROM alerts WHERE alert_date > '2022-01-01');

SELECT * FROM alerts JOIN flags ON alerts.flag_id = flags.flag_id JOIN transactions ON flags.transaction_id = transactions.transaction_id WHERE alerts.alert_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT log_id, action_performed, log_date FROM audit_logs WHERE performed_by LIKE 'Admin%' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
